column4: Hello all. I have a slight problem. Some douchebag issued a move command with an empty variable and a * in it...
meaning most of the system has been moved to
yeah well mv: command not found
is mv inside it? and is the path your cwd?
ok, um, er, dunno chroot, however silly that might be
or perform the move from outside the system I guess
I wish I could help further, I'm out of ideas :(
just what I was going to say :)
oh well, this time you were first
